text: *Richard Tucker (actor) (1884–1942), American film actor *Richard Tucker (tenor) (1913-1975), American opera singer **Richard Tucker Music Foundation, an American non-profit organization dedicated to developing the next generation of opera singers *Richard Tucker (Bermuda) (c.1786–after 1850), Bermudian community leader and businessman, helped free slaves from the Enterprise *Richard Tucker (wool-scourer) (1856–1922), New Zealand wool-scourer and wool-classer *Richard Hawley Tucker (1859–1952), American astronomer
title: Richard Tucker (disambiguation)
